author: Harry MacElhone
description: Cognac and Grand Marnier are well-suited bedfellows in this spirit-forward "stiff steadier". Dry vermouth combines with these surprisingly well. Adding balance and herbal complexity.
name: Burnt Fuselage
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
